guide.title: How Umarel Works
guide.subtitle: No confusion. No hidden steps. Just people helping people, verified by community wisdom.
guide.intro: We know home repairs and services can be stressful. Umarel removes the uncertainty by breaking every job into small, verified steps.

seeker.title: I Need Help (The Seeker)
seeker.desc: You have a problem to solve or a dream to build.
seeker.step1Desc: Don't worry about technical terms. Just tell us what you need (e.g., 'Fix my leaky sink'). Our AI Helper will ask the right questions.
seeker.step2Desc: Instead of a blind quote, you get a 'Slicing Plan'. The job is broken into small chunks (Slices). You see exactly what each part costs.
seeker.step3Desc: You never pay 100% upfront. You fund one Slice at a time. The money stays safe in Escrow until YOU (and the Umarel) say it's done.

creator.title: I Offer Skills (The Creator)
creator.desc: You are a professional who wants to work, not argue about money.
creator.step1Desc: The scope is defined before you start. No 'scope creep'. You know exactly what 'Done' looks like.
creator.step2Desc: When a Slice is funded, the money is already there. Do the work, upload the proof, and get paid instantly.
creator.step3Desc: Every completed Slice adds to your 'Aura'. High Aura means better jobs and community respect.

umarel.title: I Watch & Verify (The Umarel)
umarel.desc: You are the wise neighbor who ensures things are done right.
umarel.step1Desc: Use your experience to spot missing details in a quote. 'They forgot the primer!'
umarel.step2Desc: Look at the photos uploaded. Is the wall actually painted? Is it smooth?
umarel.step3Desc: For every verification, you earn a small dividend. Your eyes have value.

faq.title: Common Questions
faq.q1: What happens if I'm not happy?
faq.a1: The money is in Escrow. If the work isn't right, you don't click 'Approve'. Our AI Assistant immediately steps in to guide the mediation process.
faq.a2: Yes. The 'Slices' form a digital agreement. It protects both sides better than a handshake.
faq.q3: Do I need to be a tech expert?
faq.a3: No. If you can take a photo and send a text, you can use Umarel. Our AI Assistant guides every step.
